This programme is open source and released under GPLv2. For further information
about licensing and copying see the file LICENSE.txt.

To install the programme, follow the instructions given in INSTALL.txt

For support requests and bug reports, please use the facilities provided at
http://developer.berlios.de/projects/dvt/ (forums, wikis and bug tracking).
Please do not mail me unless it is absolutely necessary.
